name: Cold Sweat
description: Insanely fast and furious DEATHMATCH for DOOM II. A large symmetrical room is the setting, with 4 teleports leading to 4 symmetrical antechambers. It is VERY hard to get a bearing on where you actually are... which is exactly the point. If you want to rest use the antechambers, but make sure you are not followed... Good Luck and watch your back.
